name: The Vampire(?) Detective and the Case of the Lying Maid
name_original: The Vampire(?) Detective and the Case of the Lying Maid
description:
Enid had a crush on her eccentric lady Olivia for as long as she can remember, but she'll rather die than admit it. One day, she's summoned to Olivia's study for an unclear reason...

***

☆ A light-hearted yuri mystery with a "battle of wits" motif

☆ Playtime: 15-20 minutes (~5k words)

☆ Only one ending, choices are for flavour, and there are no wrong answers

☆ Made for NaNoReNo23

***

Credits:

☆ Art, story and programming by omure

☆ GUI design assistance by a kindly anonymous oneesama

☆ Music and sound effects by SuloSounds, Amacha music, PocketSE and MusMus
